CustomAlgorithm.name: EventTranscriberAlgorithm

MetaCommand.name: ST03_Enable
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Enable the generation of housekeeping reports

MetaCommand.name: ST03_Disable
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Disable the generation of housekeeping reports

MetaCommand.name: ST03_SetInterval
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Set the generation interval of housekeeping reports

MetaCommand.name: TestError
MetaCommand.shortDescription: An erroneous command to test parsing errors

MetaCommand.name: ST08_Function
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Run an ST[08] on-board function

MetaCommand.name: Log
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Output a string via UART

MetaCommand.name: MCU_Reset
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Perform a soft reset of the MCU

MetaCommand.name: Sensor1_Restart
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Restart Sensor 1

MetaCommand.name: Sensor2_Restart
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Restart Sensor 2

MetaCommand.name: OnBoardMonitoring_Enable
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Enable the entire on-board monitoring function

MetaCommand.name: OnBoardMonitoring_Disable
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Disable the entire on-board monitoring function

MetaCommand.name: ST20_SetOne
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Set one on-board parameter

MetaCommand.name: Set_Temp1_Status
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Set the status of temperature sensor 1

MetaCommand.name: Set_Temp2_Status
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Set the status of temperature sensor 2

MetaCommand.name: ST12_ListAllDefinitions
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Report the list of all parameter monitoring definitions

MetaCommand.name: ST19_ListAllEventAction
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Report the list of all event-action definitions

MetaCommand.name: ST19_Enable
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Enable the event-action function

MetaCommand.name: ST19_ListEventActionRequest
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Show an event-action definition with TC requests

MetaCommand.name: ST19_Disable
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Disable the event-action function

MetaCommand.name: ST19_Enable_Definition
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Enable one event-action definition

MetaCommand.name: ST19_Disable_Definition
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Disable one event-action definition

MetaCommand.name: ST19_Add_Definition
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Create one event-action definition

MetaCommand.name: ST19_Delete_Definition
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Delete one event-action definition

MetaCommand.name: ST12_Enable_Definition
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Enable one on-board parameter monitoring definition

MetaCommand.name: ST12_Disable_Definition
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Disable one on-board parameter monitoring definition

MetaCommand.name: ST12_Add_Definition
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Add a parameter monitoring definition

MetaCommand.name: ST12_Add_Definition_Limit
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Add a parameter monitoring definition: Limit check, float type

MetaCommand.name: ST12_Add_Definition_Expected_Value
MetaCommand.shortDescription: Add a parameter monitoring definition: Expected value, uint64_t type
